channel.title: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex
channel.description: Map: bm_c1a2b setpos -341.311188 516.334229 354.031250;setang -21.536196 -37.345074 0.000000 EDIT: Sorry, my mistake, memory served me wrong and I assumed it was because of the new ladder mechanics, i forgot that you had to break it open.

item.title: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: MysticJ
item.description:
To clarify,

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=437957299

Office complex, a shaft-ladder that opens. Under some circumstances, player can kinda “clips” through it and get stuck in the ceiling. In this particular case, turning around and destroying the ceiling tiles helped get up.

I had the issue of clipping through ladders in Unforseen consequences (getting out of water at the encounter with the bullsquid), then this one and some more.

Read full topic
item.source: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex

item.title: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: dogelition_man
item.description:
When I try to take the ladder, I am not close enough to the ladder to fit through the small space and so I hit the ceiling. I cannot go down the ladder after noclipping up either, as the space is too small.

Read full topic
item.source: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex

item.title: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
We don’t have any new ladder physics, those are for MP only. Could you describe the issue in a bit more detail please, so we can get an idea of what’s going on?

Read full topic
item.source: The new ladder physics made it impossible to use the alternative path in Office Complex
